Mixers.jl

  • Readme
  • Docstrings
    • Docstrings
    Docstrings
    Mixers.@mix — Macro.

    Generates a mixin macro that preserve parametric types. Fields and parametric types are appended to the struct. Identical parametric types are merged.

    Mixers.@pour — Macro.

    Generates simple macros for inserting any lines anywhere.

    Mixers.@premix — Macro.

    Just like @mix but generated macro insert fields and types at the start of the definition.
